Text:
Seriously guys, not a lot of people jumping up and down to DL this. 

Please see this.

Best time to DL this from me is from about 6pm-9am 7 days a week central time. 

If you are not gettig it fast or have slow services just DL and wait. Be patient.

Look for others, comment, and make requests.
Thanks for posting this. How does this version differ from the many other versions out there? (Besides the packaging) Thanks again!
What's the crap with the FLAC!?!  Damn-it not everyone has a burner and software to convert into mp3. I'm sick of listening to Flacs through my PC speakers!
